paper_abstract: We address the question of whether the primal-dual approach for the design and analysis of online algorithms can be applied to nonmonotone problems. We provide a positive answer by presenting a primal-dual analysis to the online algorithm of Awerbuch et al. [3] for routing virtual circuits with unknown durations. (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A nonmonotone analysis with the primal-dual approach: Online routing of virtual circuits with unknown durations
